name: VI-Active™
description: VI-Active™ is a 100% natural turmeric extract (monitored by HPLC, DNA and 14C) standardized to 95% curcuminoids and formulated with natural biostimulants such as turmeric oil and sunflower oil, making it unique in the market. Clinical studies have been conducted to prove that VI-Active™ Turmeric Extract has better bioavailability than a standard turmeric extract. This extract is available in organic form.
